text: ────Um, did you just finish your lesson?

I have some time before the next job,
so I thought I'd look up the origins of the June bride.

Oh...... The talk theme for the upcoming recording is
"marriage", right......

June doesn't really have any special events, so......
maybe they made up this event to fill the gap?
Oh...... I don't really know the real reason......

────Well, no matter which month you get married,
I'm sure that day will be the best day for the couple......
